name: ssvmrpc
description: A mechanism to deploy and execute WebAssembly(Wasm) code on secondstate.io's stateless stack-based virtual machine, located at github.com/second-state/SSVM. This nodejs application, takes JSON request objects and returns JSON response objects. It does this by contacting a valid service provider that is running secondstate.io's Wasm as a service (server software) located at github.com/second-state/SSVMRPC.
author: @tpmccallum
